name: A way Home - global gamejam 2019
description:
This game was made for the Global Game Jam in 2019.

The goal of the gam is to get home where it is safe and warm. You need to get through obstacles in this platformer, avoiding danger in the cold and harsh outside world. Can you make it back?

Developers:

Baris Buba

Quinn McGregor

Paul Swinkels

Artists:

Floyd Stam

Finn Versteegh
